encodes a potential activator of Rop GTPase signaling
The deduced amino acid sequence of KAR encodes a highly conserved plant-specific Rop
nucleotide exchanger (PRONE) catalytic domain, which is characteristic of the guanine
nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) of the Rop GTPase [19], while the N- and C-terminal
regions outside of the PRONE domain were highly variable (Figure S3). In angiosperms,
Rop signaling mediated by RopGEF is involved in various developmental processes and
